thread.title: NOTICE OF SHERIFF'S SALEOn October 27, 2015, at the hour
thread.title_full: NOTICE OF SHERIFF'S SALEOn October 27, 2015, at the hour

title: NOTICE OF SHERIFF'S SALEOn October 27, 2015, at the hour
text:
NOTICE OF SHERIFF'S SALEOn October 27, 2015, at the hour ad date: 10/07/2015 
NOTICE OF SHERIFF'S SALEOn October 27, 2015, at the hour of 11:00 o' clock a.m. at the Curry County Courthouse, front steps, 29821 Ellensburg, Gold Beach, Oregon, the defendant's interest will be sold, subject to redemption, in the real property commonly known as: 94242 Vale Drive, Gold Beach, Oregon 97444-7734 ("Subject Property"). The court case number is 15CV0083, where WELLS FARGO BANK, N.A. is plaintiff, and ROBERT K. OLIVER; TAMMY J. OLIVER; WESTERN MERCANTILE AGENCY INC.; LVNV FUNDING LLC; AND ALL OTHER PERSONS OR PARTIES UNKNOWN CLAIMING ANY RIGHT, TITLE, LIEN, OR INTEREST IN THE REAL PROPERTY COMMONLY KNOWN AS 94242 VALE DR, GOLD BEACH, OR 97444-7734 is defendant. The sale is a public auction to the highest bidder for cash or cashier's check, in hand, made out to Curry County Sheriff's Office. For more information on this sale go to: www.oregonsheriffs.com/sales.htm Publish September 23, 30, October 7 & 14, 2015No. 71109246
